scripts.package-win: rm -rf node_modules/puppeteer/.local-chromium && electron-packager . ats --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="ATS" && node installers/windows/createinstaller.js
